stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Are you interested in learning more about Site Reliability Engineering? Circle the dates of September 14th-15th for SREday in London and grab your early bird tickets before they're gone!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Are you interested in learning more about Site Reliability Engineering? Circle the dates of September 14th-15th for SREday in London and grab your early bird tickets before they're gone! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: NASA and IBM embrace open-source
stories.Description: IBM's watsonx.ai is now available on Hugging Face, making it the largest geospatial foundation model on the platform, and the first open-source AI model developed in partnership with NASA.
stories.Tweet: NASA and IBM embrace open-source 📦 IBM's watsonx.ai is now available on Hugging Face, making it the largest geospatial foundation model on the platform, and the first open-source AI model developed in partnership with NASA. #NASA https://newsroom.ibm.com/2023-08-03-IBM-and-NASA-Open-Source-Largest-Geospatial-AI-Foundation-Model-on-Hugging-Face

stories.Title: The state of AI in 2023
stories.Description: McKinsey's survey reveals that generative AI tools are reshaping industries and workforces. One-third of respondents use it regularly in at least one business function within a year of its debut.
stories.Tweet: The state of AI in 2023 📦 McKinsey's survey reveals that generative AI tools are reshaping industries and workforces. One-third of respondents use it regularly in at least one business function within a year of its debut. #ai https://www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai-in-2023-generative-ais-breakout-year

stories.Title: Alibaba bets on AI democratization
stories.Description: The Chinese e-commerce giant expands accessibility in AI development by opening up its large language model, Tongyi Qianwen, with a seven-billion-parameter model, Qwen-7B, for global use.
stories.Tweet: Alibaba bets on AI democratization 📦 The Chinese e-commerce giant expands accessibility in AI development by opening up its large language model, Tongyi Qianwen, with a seven-billion-parameter model, Qwen-7B, for global use. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/08/03/alibaba-launches-open-sourced-ai-model-in-challenge-to-meta.html

stories.Title: AI for breast cancer diagnosis
stories.Description: A recent study reveals how AI could be as effective as two human radiologists at detecting breast cancer. Further research may solidify AI's role in early diagnosis and treatment.
stories.Tweet: AI for breast cancer diagnosis 📦 A recent study reveals how AI could be as effective as two human radiologists at detecting breast cancer. Further research may solidify AI's role in early diagnosis and treatment. #ai https://gizmodo.com/ai-good-at-breast-cancer-screenings-study-finds-1850699674

stories.Title: Meet NASA's CADRE project
stories.Description: Three miniature rovers will be roaming on the lunar surface in 2024. Operating without direct Earth input, they'll showcase new technology and the promise of more efficient space missions.
stories.Tweet: Meet NASA's CADRE project 📦 Three miniature rovers will be roaming on the lunar surface in 2024. Operating without direct Earth input, they'll showcase new technology and the promise of more efficient space missions. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/jpl/nasa-s-trio-of-mini-rovers-will-team-up-to-explore-the-moon

stories.Title: A home away from home
stories.Description: ESA's PLATO mission is on the horizon, offering a glimpse into cosmic diversity. Set to launch in 2026, it is intended to explore over 245,000 stars for Earth-like planets.
stories.Tweet: A home away from home 📦 ESA's PLATO mission is on the horizon, offering a glimpse into cosmic diversity. Set to launch in 2026, it is intended to explore over 245,000 stars for Earth-like planets. #ESA https://interestingengineering.com/science/plato-mission-could-detect-tens-thousands-habitable-planets

stories.Title: Subaru's electrifying plans
stories.Description: The Japanese automaker takes a strategic leap into the electric vehicle market, revealing a roadmap with eight EV models set for 2028.
stories.Tweet: Subaru's electrifying plans 📦 The Japanese automaker takes a strategic leap into the electric vehicle market, revealing a roadmap with eight EV models set for 2028. #subaru https://electrek.co/2023/08/02/subaru-shifts-focus-evs-plans-eight-electric-models-2028/

stories.Title: Check out Acura's first EV
stories.Description: Honda's luxury brand has shared a glimpse of the all-electric 2024 ZDX, set to launch on August 17th, during Monterey Car Week.
stories.Tweet: Check out Acura's first EV 📦 Honda's luxury brand has shared a glimpse of the all-electric 2024 ZDX, set to launch on August 17th, during Monterey Car Week. #acura https://www.engadget.com/acura-teases-the-zdx-its-first-electric-vehicle-130051990.html

stories.Title: Typical Apple: Slow and steady
stories.Description: Ahead of the earnings call, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo provides insights into Apple's approach to AI, and its chatbot specifically: It's a long-term project with no immediate impact on stock prices.
stories.Tweet: Typical Apple: Slow and steady 📦 Ahead of the earnings call, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo provides insights into Apple's approach to AI, and its chatbot specifically: It's a long-term project with no immediate impact on stock prices. #apple https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/apple-chatgpt-rival-behind-rivals/

stories.Title: Unlock GitHub's full potential
stories.Description: Find out how to structure your organizations and teams to get the most out of GitHub. Embrace efficient workflows and create the best experience for developers.
stories.Tweet: Unlock GitHub's full potential 📦 Find out how to structure your organizations and teams to get the most out of GitHub. Embrace efficient workflows and create the best experience for developers. #github https://github.blog/2023-08-02-best-practices-for-organizations-and-teams-using-github-enterprise-cloud/

title: NASA and IBM join forces, Alibaba opens its LLM, AI enhances breast cancer detection
description: The open-source community gets the best of the best with today's announcements! NASA and IBM are launching a geospatial foundation model on Hugging Face. Alibaba doesn't lag behind its competitors and makes available its LLM to third-party developers. And continuing with the positive news (this one makes me happy), AI brings hope for early breast cancer diagnosis.
